title: Eargo Neo - Virtually Invisible Hearing Aid

description.detailed:
• Virtually Invisible


    Eargos are beautifully designed to never be seen, so your little secret stays a secret.

  • Rechargeable

    Our on-the-go rechargeable case makes sure you?re powered up for whatever life throws at you next.

  • Comfortable

    Eargos are so comfortable, you?ll forget they?re there, helping you out decibel after decibel.

  • Your Ears Are in Good Company

    Our team of licensed hearing professionals will be with you every step of the way.

  • Connected

    With the Eargo app you and your Personal Hearing Professional can fine-tune your Eargo Neo's settings to match your unique lifestyle.
description.short:
SAY HELLO TO A WORLD OF SOUND. Life doesn?t stop with hearing loss. Eargo Neo is the rechargeable, comfortable, and nearly invisible hearing aid that helps you hear with crystal clarity and live your life, uninterrupted. Eargo Neo is FDA cleared for mild to severe high-frequency loss.

LIFETIME SUPPORT. We pair you with a licensed hearing professional from day one. Plus, with our telehealth service, you can get Eargo Neo hearing aids and connect with a hearing health professional all from the comfort of your own home without ever having to travel to a hearing clinic or pay another co-pay. After receiving your Eargos, we?ll be on hand to help you get set up virtually and answer any and all of your questions, along with providing valuable tips to help you make the most of your Eargos. And it doesn't stop there; you'll have free and unlimited support throughout your hearing journey.

  • CONVENIENT. RECHARGEABLE CARRYING CASE: No more fumbling around for batteries. This advanced hearing amplifier set has a rechargeable battery that lasts up to 16-21 hours on a single charge. The portable charging case has a built-in lithium-ion battery that provides 3 full charges. It's like having a power bank for your hearing amplifier. They switch on automatically when removed from the charger and turn off when placed back in the charging case

  • INNOVATIVE. DUAL MICROPHONE SYSTEM: The digital adaptive sound chip and dual microphones use dynamic range compression . Which means it minimizes background sounds while actually clarifying the human voice you want to hear. Great for when you're in restaurants, meetings, watching TV, driving or during outdoor activities
